messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine the Great Pacific Mall with 15 stores. Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Sephora are all connected to each other. Pete’s Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Chickflea, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Nike are all connected to each other. Marshalls, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Target are connected to each other. Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Target are connected to each other. Paris Baguette, H&M, and Zara are connected to each other. Nike is connected to Bath and Body Works. Levis, GNC Live Well and Target are connected to each other. H&M is connected to Zara. Sephora is connected to Bath and Body Works. GNC Live Well is connected to Target. You are in Starbucks and you find a magic coffee bean with which you can teleport to any room only once. From Starbucks, what is the path that yields the most reward? Please list the store names in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Analyze the connections and identify the groups of connected stores.
Group 1: Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Sephora
Group 2: Pete’s Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, Bath and Body Works
Group 3: Chickflea, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, Nike
Group 4: Marshalls, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Target
Group 5: Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, Bath and Body Works
Group 6: Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, Target
Group 7: Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara
Group 8: Nike, Bath and Body Works
Group 9: Levis, GNC Live Well, Target
Group 10: H&M, Zara
Group 11: Sephora, Bath and Body Works
Group 12: GNC Live Well, Target

Step 2: Identify the unique stores in each group.

Step 3: Determine the path that allows visiting the most unique stores starting from Starbucks.

Starting from Starbucks, the best path would be Group 1, then teleport to Group 4 (since it has the most unique stores not visited yet), then Group 6, and finally Group 9.

Answer: Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Sephora, Marshalls, Target, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well
